document.full_text: the head of the nuclear regulatory commission, gregory jaczko, told lawmakers on wednesday he strongly believes the united states could "mitigate" the impact of a nuclear crisis similar to the one unfolding in japan.
document.title: nrc head says u.s. could handle nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: the head of the nuclear regulatory commission, gregory jaczko, told lawmakers on wednesday he strongly believes the united states could "mitigate" the impact of a nuclear crisis similar to the one unfolding in japan.
